text.tspan: Total number of deaths from road traffic incidents, including vehicle drivers or passengers, motorcyclists,
cyclists and pedestrians. SDG Target 3.6 is to halve the global number of deaths from road incidents by

text.textPath: SDG Target 3.6 (halving global road deaths by 2020)
SDG Target 3.6 (halving global road deaths by 2020)

text.tspan: Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
